title: About 30 children were taken hostage by Hamas militants. Their families wait in agony

title: Pope orders Vatican to reopen case of priest ousted after claims of adult abuse

title: Israel says the vast network of Hamas tunnels will make a ground offensive long and difficult

title: Huawei reports its revenue inched higher in January-September despite US sanctions

title: Many Israelis are furious at their government's chaotic recovery efforts after Hamas attack
